structure.unit: FORMALITY AND ASSIGNABILITY OF CONTRACTS -- INSTALLMENT SALES CONTRACTS

law.catch_line: Prior acts and agreements of retail buyer do not waive requirements of KRS 371.210 to 371.330.
law.text: No act or agreement of the retail buyer before or at the time of the making of a retail installment contract, retail charge agreement or purchases thereunder shall constitute a valid waiver of any of the provisions of KRS 371.210 to 371.330 or of any remedies granted to the buyer by law.
